name: Procurement Intelligence Unit
overview:
The Procurement Intelligence Unit has been setup to create a ‘Bloomberg for Procurement’, offering market intelligence to corporate buyers.

The Procurement Intelligence Unit (PIU) is at the forefront of innovation in the profession, providing the world’s leading organisations with critical market information, trends and best practice to support their executive and operational decision making.

As a newly formed division of the Procurement Leaders Network, the PIU works with global procurement teams to deliver timely, consolidated market data and analysis and in-depth research. In addition, the PIU brings together clients, in a non-competitive face-to-face environment to share knowledge, experiences and insight helping each uncover solutions and seize new opportunities.
